attributes.action: Stop the UK selling arms/weapons to Saudi Arabia to protect civilians in Yemen
attributes.additional_details:
The UK has recently resumed selling weapons to Saudi Arabia after the end of the ban. These weapons are being used in the conflict in Yemen in which civilians are being killed and the worst humanitarian crisis in the world is taking place. The UK not add to this by selling weapons. Yemen: UK to resume Saudi arms sales after humanitarian review https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-politics-53324251
https://www.unicef.org/emergencies/yemen-crisis
attributes.background: The uk government and parliament must immediately ban the sale of weapons and arms to Saudi Arabia and prevent the killing of innocent civilians in Yemen and must condemn the actions of Saudi Arabia. It must also help with humanitarian aid.
